function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Study participants report a lack of calmness and satisfaction with self, as well as feeling concerned and unhappy.","Impact":"Potential mental health impact on study participants if not addressed.","Mitigation":"Provide mental health support and interventions to address anxiety and related issues.","Technologies":"Cognitive-behavioral therapy, mindfulness practices, mental health apps.","People":"Study participants, potentially broader population.","Owner":"Mental health professionals, researchers, and institutions."},{"Description":"Exclusion of an indicator with high skewness and kurtosis from further statistical analysis.","Impact":"Potential distortion of overall anxiety measurement and conclusions drawn from the data.","Mitigation":"Explore reasons for skewness and kurtosis, consider alternative statistical methods, and interpret findings with caution.","Technologies":"Advanced statistical modeling, robust statistical techniques.","People":"Researchers, statisticians, and data analysts.","Owner":"Research team, statisticians, and data analysts."},{"Description":"Significant correlations among the majority of the pairs of anxiety statements, supporting internal validity of the measurement scale.","Impact":"Strengthens confidence in the accuracy of the anxiety measurement instrument.","Mitigation":"Continue to assess validity using diverse samples and methods, and consider potential sources of bias.","Technologies":"Validation studies, diverse sampling techniques, bias detection methods.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, and validation experts.","Owner":"Research team, validation experts, and institutions."}]}
